definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Even those on the outside know about it.
You know how many perverts are out there?
sentences.chinese: 你知道現在外頭有多少流氓嗎？

sentences.english: You're right. Let's just get on. I'll see you outside before you see me.
sentences.chinese: 你所言極是，好好活下去，我將在外頭第一個看望你。

sentences.english: It's really embarrassing when he acts up in public.
sentences.chinese: 他在外頭耍脾氣，真令我難爲情。

sentences.english: Having to take care of her child, this volunteer chooses to recite the sutra outside the worshipping hall.
sentences.chinese: 因爲要照顧孩子，這位媽媽選擇在佛堂外頭背誦經文。

sentences.english: Under a wool jacket with a miniature American flag pin on the lapel.
sentences.chinese: 外頭套件羊毛夾克，翻領上彆着小小的美國國旗徽章。

sentences.english: Mum inside of it and me outside.
when I should find thee without, I would kiss thee; yea, I should not be despised.
sentences.chinese: 我在外頭遇見你就與你親嘴，誰也不輕看我。

sentences.english: Sorb children make sure that they put food out for the birds over the long cold winter months.
sentences.chinese: 在漫漫寒冬，索布孩童一定會拿食物到外頭喂鳥。

sentences.english: One blustery January day I had to do some outside work.
sentences.chinese: 在一月某個颳大風的日子裏，我必須到外頭去幹活。

definition: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
